title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
POWER A WORLD OF TRUST

Incode is the leading provider of world-class identity solutions that is reinventing the way humans authenticate and verify their identities online to power a world of digital trust.

Through our revolutionary identity solutions, we are unleashing the business potential of universal industries including finance, government, retail, hospitality, gaming, and more, by reducing fraud and transforming human interactions with data, products, and services.

Weâre in the process of rapidly scaling our diverse global team and weâre looking for entrepreneurial individuals and leaders who are curious, driven, and excited by ownership to join a Unicorn-status scale-up!

About Incode

Incode is a Series B unicorn rewriting how the world proves identity. Our AI-powered platform lets leading banks, fintechs, marketplaces, and governments deliver friction-free experiences while defeating fraud and safeguarding privacy. Customers such as Citi, AirBnB, Block, Chime, Sixt, and TikTok rely on Incode to power their identity verification and security.

Recently named a Leader in the GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ¢ for Identity Verification, weâre scaling fast - and weâre looking for world-class Machine Learning Engineers to help us keep pushing the boundaries of biometric technology.

The Impact Youâll Make

As a Machine Learning Engineer at Incode, youâll design, build, and deploy the deep learning models that power our most advanced technologies â from facial recognition and liveness detection to document processing and ID validation.

Youâll join a highly specialized engineering team working on solving complex, real-world challenges with cutting-edge ML architectures. Your work will directly influence how people verify their identity safely, seamlessly, and securely around the world.

What Youâll Own & Drive

  • Innovate & Optimize - Develop and refine state-of-the-art deep learning models for computer vision applications such as facial recognition, liveness detection, and document processing and validation.
  • Production-Ready Solutions - Architect and maintain scalable, efficient ML pipelines and ensure production-readiness and cost efficiency of deployed models.
  • Research & Discovery - Engage in research to discover new methodologies and techniques that can enhance our product offerings.


Please mention the word **SOFTER** and tag RMjQwOTo0MGYyOjEwM2U6MThhODphMjJjOmM1NTA6NzZkMTpiZGE0 when applying to show you read the job post completely (#RMjQwOTo0MGYyOjEwM2U6MThhODphMjJjOmM1NTA6NzZkMTpiZGE0). title: Data Scientist
description:
Welcome to CloudWalk â a Brazilian fintech that is on a mission to harness the power of AI to drive operational excellence. The future is unfolding, and we are actively seeking individuals who want to be hands-on contributors to shaping the next chapter of technology. If you are ready to explore the vast capabilities of AI and data science to enhance operational efficiency, read on.


About the team:

Our team is responsible for building behavioral-based models and engaging in research-oriented projects towards evolutionary expert systems. We see data science as a blend of science and craftsmanshipâdelivering solutions that exceed customer expectations. Collaboration is at the core of our team culture. Together, we embrace challenges, learn from failures, and celebrate successes.

You will be joining a team that focuses on developing fraud detection models based on user and entity behavior patterns in the data. We work in a high-paced environment where projects range from evolutionary computation, llms to graph neural networks (GNNs) and machine learning research.


About the role:

As a Data Scientist, you will focus on building, training, and optimizing machine learning models to solve business problems such as fraud detection. You will be involved in every stage of the data science workflow, from exploratory data analysis and feature engineering to model deployment and post-production monitoring. You will work on research-driven projects, applying the latest advancements in machine learning and AI to develop state-of-the-art solutions for complex problems.

If you are passionate about data, algorithms, and applying research into real-world scenarios, this is the role for you. We thrive on solving hard problems, and we welcome those who bring innovation and fresh ideas to our team.


\n


What do we need
  • Experience in building and deploying machine learning models.
  • Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
  • Ability to work with LLMs
  • Experience with cloud-based environments like GCP 
  • Experience in using data pipelines for model training and inference.
  • Knowledge of statistical techniques and model evaluation metrics.


Nice to Have
  • Experience working on projects related to fraud detection, risk analysis in financial services
  • Experience with LLMs , Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) or other advanced deep learning architectures.
  • Experience in developing scalable data science solutions for real-time applications.
  • Knowledge of Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services for machine learning and model deployment.


Responsibilities
  • Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models for fraud detection and behavioral analysis.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, product managers, and software engineers, to integrate models into production.
  • Research and implement new machine learning algorithms and techniques that push the boundaries of existing models.
  • Monitor the performance of models in production, optimizing them for scalability and efficiency.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in machine learning and data science to continuously drive innovation within the team.


Our Interview Process
  • Online/take-home technical assessment 
  • Technical interview
  • Panel interview
  • Final interview


\n

If you are not willing to do an online or take home assignment , please do not apply.
